SEARCH
Package src.application

Class AdminLogic

java.lang.Object
src.application.AdminLogic
public class AdminLogic extends Object
The AdminLogic class manages the business logic for administrator-related operations. It handles actions such as displaying dialogs, adding songs, processing files, managing user votes, generating bottoms, and opening user interfaces.

    • addSongDialog

      public String addSongDialog(String genreName, String title, String artist, String album)
      Checks if a song with the specified details already exists in the library, and adds the song to the specified genre if it doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      genreName - The name of the genre to add the song to.
      title - The title of the song.
      artist - The artist of the song.
      album - The album of the song.
      Returns:
      An error message if the song already exists, null otherwise.

    • readAndProcessFile

      public void readAndProcessFile(File selectedFile, javafx.scene.control.TextArea fileContentArea)

      Parameters:
      selectedFile - The selected file to read.
      fileContentArea - The text area to display the file content.

      public boolean showAddUserByNameDialog(String username, String password)
      Adds a new user with the specified username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to add.
      password - The password of the user to add.
      Returns:
      True if the user is successfully added, false otherwise.
